GeometryArrays Class

Extends GeometryLeaf
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryArrays.ts:71
Module: core
Parent Module: EIGHT

Constructor

GeometryArrays

(
  • engine
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryArrays.ts:71

Parameters:

  • engine Engine

Example:

 const engine = new EIGHT.Engine()
const geometry = new EIGHT.GeometryArrays(engine)
 geometry.drawMode = EIGHT.DrawMode.LINES
 geometry.setAttribute('aPosition', {values: [0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1], size: 2})
 geometry.setAttribute('aColor', {values: [0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0], size: 3})
geometry.draw(material)
geometry.release()

subscribe

(
  • engine
  • synchronize
)
Void

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer: src/davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:91

Instructs the consumer to subscribe to context events.

This method is idempotent; calling it more than once with the same Engine does not change the state.

Parameters:

  • engine Engine
  • synchronize Boolean

Returns:

Void:

unsubscribe

(
  • synchronize
)
Void

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer: src/davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:138

Instructs the consumer to unsubscribe from context events.

This method is idempotent; calling it more than once does not change the state.

Parameters:

  • synchronize Boolean
    Triggers contextFree() or contextLost(), as appropriate.

Returns:

Void:

Properties

_drawMode

DrawMode private

Inherited from GeometryLeaf: src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryLeaf.ts:23

_pointers

VertexAttribPointer[] protected

Inherited from GeometryLeaf: src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryLeaf.ts:52

_stride

Number protected

Inherited from GeometryLeaf: src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryLeaf.ts:37

The number of bytes for each element.

This is used in the vertexAttribPointer method. Normally, we will use gl.FLOAT for each number which takes 4 bytes.

contextProvider

ContextProvider protected

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer: src/davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:57

count

Number private

Defined in src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryArrays.ts:49

The count parameter in the drawArrays call. This is currently maintained at this level because this class only supportes buffering one primitive.

drawMode

DrawMode

Inherited from GeometryLeaf: src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryLeaf.ts:79

engine

Engine private

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer: src/davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:50

first

Number private

Defined in src/davinci-eight/core/GeometryArrays.ts:39

The first parameter in the drawArrays call. This is currently hard-code to zero because this class only supportes buffering one primitive.

gl

WebGLRenderingContext deprecated

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer: src/davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:201

Provides access to the underlying WebGL context.

This property is deprecated to encourage access throught the ContextProvider.
